// src/redux/actions.js
export const addTask=task=>({type:'ADD_TASK',payload:{task,completed:false}});export const deleteTask=index=>({type:'DELETE_TASK',payload:index});export const editTask=(index,newTask)=>({type:'EDIT_TASK',payload:{index,newTask}});export const toggleTask=index=>({type:'TOGGLE_TASK',payload:index});
